programme.title: Badal
programme.desc: Badal witnesses his family being massacred during a riot in his village. He is raised by a terrorist and soon sets out to exact revenge on the police officer responsible for his family's murder.

programme.title: Hello Hum Lallan Bol Rahe Hain
programme.desc: Lallan, a security guard, loves Saroja, who is supposed to get married to an older man for money. However, while convincing her to change her mind, he finds out another shocking fact about her.

programme.title: Paagalpan
programme.desc: Young and attractive Roma Pinto is the only girl in the struggling Pinto family, consisting of five brothers who are all very protective of their sister. When Roma meets Sameer Malhotra they fall in love and wish to be married, but Sameer's father will not let him marry a poor girl and Roma's brothers will not let her get close to anyone.

programme.title: Gali Gali Chor Hai
programme.desc: Bharat, a small-time artist, finds himself dealing with the effects of a corrupt system. In the process, he himself discovers his ideals and decides to fight for the rights of the common people.

programme.title: Filhaal
programme.desc: When Sia watches her best friend Rewa slip into depression because of her inability to bear a child, she offers to be her surrogate. Trouble brews when jealousy finds its way into their relationship.

programme.title: Badal
programme.desc: Badal witnesses his family being massacred during a riot in his village. He is raised by a terrorist and soon sets out to exact revenge on the police officer responsible for his family's murder.

programme.title: Lucky-No Time For Love
programme.desc: A story of Lucky, a yound girl who is taken in by a wealthy family in Russia after being orphaned in war-torn Afghanistan . While adapting to her new surroundings, she meets a man who is initially distant and unapproachable, but eventually spend more time together and form a deep bond. Despite facing cultural differences and other obstacles, their love perseveres as they strive to be together.

programme.title: Dil Toh Bachcha Hai Ji
programme.desc: Three roommates are in search of true love. They each find a girl with whom they fall head over heels in love with. Now they just have to get the women to reciprocate.

programme.title: Maine Dil Tujhko Diya
programme.desc: Ajay loves Ayesha but her father does not approve of Ajay and decides to marry her off to his business partner's son instead. When Ajay persists, her father hires a goon to kill him.

programme.title: Hum To Mohabbat Karega
programme.desc: To pursue his love interest, TV reporter Geeta, Raju misleads the police with false clues during a murder investigation. His lies soon land him in trouble with the police and the mafia.

programme.title: Kuch Toh Hai
programme.desc: The movie follows the story of a young couple who move into a new house, only to discover that it is haunted by a mysterious presence. As they try to unravel the truth behind the entity, they uncover a dark secret that threatens their very existence.

programme.title: Mangani
programme.desc: " All men sin and suffer but ho who suffers for the atonment of the sins of others is a great human. " In a small village, on the banks of the Ganges, lived Gopal, the only son of a soldier who had died on the battlefield while he was still a child daughter devi had great attachment to them. Gopal and Devi were playmates and when they grew up, they fell in love with each other. One day, a village belle who was to become an unwedded mother, was about to be thrown out of the village . The son of the headmen was equally to be blamed but nobody pointed out his mistake. It was Gopal who saved the girl from the mass fury and punished the headman's son . He turned his avowed enemy, Gopal's mother sent Gopal to another village where he got a job in the household of the Zamindar. Zamindar's son vilas came home in vacation and to entertain him, Gopal took him to his own village. When they arrived at the village temple Devi had been giving a dance rectical. The occasion was Janmashtmi, Vilas was introduced to Devi. He tried to flout her modesty. Gopal saved her and taught him the lesson of his life. Gopal bid farewell to devi and went to the city to seek a job Devi took a promise from him that he will not try to take the blame of others misdoings on him. His employer, Dhaniram's daughter Rangilee was about to become an unwedded mother too. Gopal took the blame on himself sethji agreed to give Rangile's hand in marriage to Gopal. Gopal left for his village to seek permission of him mother and Devi. Devi misunderstood him she thought he was the father of Rangilee's unborn child. She tried to commit suicide What happened of Rangilee ? Dear Pairous it is not the end but is father the beginning of a new life of a sugar human, To know him you will have to see MAANAVATA from beginning to end

programme.title: Pratigyabadh
programme.desc: After her husband travels to Bombay to try to make some money in order to pay back a loan to local money-lender Lala Sukhilal, Laxmi is left lonely and apprehensive with her three children. When they fail to hear from him for months Sukhilal offers to help as long as Laxmi becomes intimate with him, but when she refuses he decides to repossess their home and belongings as repayment for the loan.

programme.title: Luv Kush
programme.desc: After Ram returns to Ayodhya, Sita is forced to go into exile. She gives birth to twins Lav and Kush, who later go to Ayodhya to attain blessings of Ram and recite the Ramayan.

programme.title: Dastaan
programme.desc: Vishnu, a reputed judge, is assumed to be Anil, an absconding murderer. However, he decides to travel to Anil's home town and unravel the mystery behind his lookalike's existence.

programme.title: Patthar Ke Phool
programme.desc: A young lady having grown up in a household full of love and admiration, Suraj is now a young adult who had no idea her father has been part of a dangerous mafia; she eventually falls in love with a police officer.

programme.title: Kasak
programme.desc: Divya, a young woman, loves Suraj, who dies an unfortunate and untimely death. She is soon forced to marry Vijay due to familial pressure but not long after demands that he divorce her.

programme.title: Bhala Manus
programme.desc: Shankar a simple villager comes to Bombay in such of work to improve his financial condition but circumstances force him to take up smuggling.

programme.title: Aao Pyar Karein
programme.desc: When the times comes for a wealthy man to marry, his parents find a suitable match, but he goes against their wishes and marries a woman from a poor family. He moves out of his palatial family home and goes to live with his wife.

programme.title: Phool Aur Angaar
programme.desc: A young man rescues a woman from being molested but gets accused of the heinous crime instead. Trying to apprehend the miscreants, he gets caught in a web of deception and lies.

programme.title: R D Burman – Musical Maverick
programme.desc: A powerhouse collection of R.D. Burman's iconic hits, blending innovation, emotion, and energy. From soulful ballads to electrifying grooves, experience the genius of Pancham Da that defined Bollywood's golden soundscape.

programme.title: Best Of 70s – The Golden Era
programme.desc: Step into Bollywood’s most soulful decade with this jukebox of evergreen melodies. A rich tapestry of romance, innocence, and timeless charm – pure nostalgia from the golden 70s.

programme.title: Best Of 90s – Filmy Beats Reloaded
programme.desc: Take a ride through the vibrant 90s with peppy love anthems, dramatic duets, and emotional melodies. This jukebox celebrates the signature style of Bollywood's musical revival decade.

programme.title: Rajesh Khanna – The Superstar's Anthems
programme.desc: Revisit the unmatched charm of Rajesh Khanna with this jukebox of unforgettable melodies. Romantic, philosophical, and heartfelt – these songs defined an era and a superstar.

programme.title: Jeetendra Hits The Jumping Jack
programme.desc: Dive into Jeetendra’s iconic hits—The Jumping Jack’s timeless energy! Relive the magic of Bollywood’s golden era with foot-tapping beats, romance, and pure nostalgia!

programme.title: Neetu Singh Evergreen Hits
programme.desc: Turn up the retro vibes with Neetu Singh’s greatest hits! A birthday playlist packed with nostalgia, romance, and endless charm.

programme.title: Superhits Of 90s
programme.desc: Relive the '90s with Superhits! Romantic melodies, peppy beats, and timeless nostalgia—dance, sing along, and fall in love all over again!

programme.title: Dharmendra He Man Of Bollywood
programme.desc: Time-travel through Dharmendra's iconic hits – the ultimate He-Man of Bollywood! Timeless romance, unforgettable melodies that define an era of pure masala magic!

programme.title: Alka Yagnik Superhit Singer
programme.desc: Press play on nostalgia! Alka Yagnik's velvet voice brings back memories with these evergreen hits that still give us goosebumps today.

programme.title: Dimple Kapadia & Neetu Singh
programme.desc: Dance through the disco era with Dimple & Neetu! Playful whispers, foot-tapping romance, and melodies that defined a generation’s dreams.

programme.title: Mithun Chakraborty
programme.desc: Get ready to groove with Mithun Da's greatest hits! From 'Disco Dancer' to romantic ballads, this collection is pure Bollywood retro gold.

programme.title: Best Of B R Chopra
programme.desc: Dive into these timeless tracks that shaped Hindi cinema's musical heritage. The golden touch of B.R. Chopra - where every song became legendary.

programme.title: Hema Malini Parveen Babi Hit Bollywood Divas
programme.desc: The Original Bollywood Divas! Hema's elegance + Parveen's sass = Unbeatable 70s magic. Press play for nostalgia in every note!

programme.title: Dance Hits
programme.desc: Pure nostalgia on the dance floor! Celebrate the vibrant sounds of old-school Hindi dance music with timeless beats and retro charm.

programme.title: Shahenshah Of Bollywood-83rd Birthday Special Vol 2
programme.desc: Iconic melodies of Amitabh Bachchan reflecting romance,pride, and cinematic brilliance.

programme.title: Beyond Failing
programme.desc: This film captures intricate nuances of student stress, competition the so called rat race, parent child relation and purposeless living vs. purposeful living.

programme.title: Goals
programme.desc: As Meera, our pretty in pink protagonist comes back to Bombay after spending several months apart from her beau Ranbir, the circumstances force them to evaluate the basis of their relationship. This film is a deep dive into a young adult's core problems of emotional dishonesty and preference of style over substance.

programme.title: Dadi Ka Murabba
programme.desc: Ramesh dreams of a good job but his lack of fluent English hinders him. His Dadi advises him to be self-reliant, prompting him to sell murabba with her help. His business grows, and he asked to raise the flag at his old school on Independence Day. The sarpanch tells him that as a self-reliant young individual, Ramesh can add to the nation's growth. The film shows that it takes both an individual's grit and determination and the support of loved ones to achieve the impossible.

programme.title: Epicfail
programme.desc: It is difficult to understand the truth about Ramayana in today’s time as it gets lost in translation. This is a film about a young and passionate journalist discovering the truth about Sita.

programme.title: Firni
programme.desc: The next-door neighbors are having a fight and they send their rude 14-year-old daughter Firni to keep her busy.

programme.title: Duty
programme.desc: Different classes in society are intertwined, with each person's actions impacting others. When individuals from various classes fulfil their responsibilities, stability is achieved. This story explores fairness and the expression of duty among people from different social strata.

programme.title: Chup Chap
programme.desc: Following a newlywed couple enjoying a robust and empathetic bond, their world takes a turn during a party with friends, sparking a profound shift in their perspectives. Despite their differing opinions, both stand firm in their convictions. When an issue deeply troubles the wife, she bravely advocates for justice. After a prolonged battle, legal verdict is achieved. Yet, uncertainties linger about the truth behind this justice, leaving the tale shrouded in ambiguity.

programme.title: Firefly
programme.desc: A chance encounter with a piece from his past, leads Ved, a young man to reminisce a fateful night with his girlfriend, Daaria.

programme.title: Damdi
programme.desc: Damdi, is a story of a young boy. Whose parents left him in childhood, was pampered by her grandmother by working as a babysitter. Damdi has grown up and works in a garage, also studying together. A dear friend Paltan keeps warning him against good and evil. A garage owner Lallan bhaiya acts as a guide. Damdi is in love with a girl Gunja. He has an addiction and attraction towards intoxication, becoming the heart's weakness. Heartbreaks and despairs but returns to a new direction in life again.

programme.title: Destiny's Two
programme.desc: Mohan and his dwarf wife have come to Mumbai from Gujarat for his work. They are a newly wed couple. Their marriage is a compromise, as they do not see the spouse of their imagination in each other. Mohan who gets fascinated seeing taller women realizes the same about his wife. He decides to go to a red light area to fulfill his desire. But does he do it?

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk
programme.desc: Dawn to Dusk tells the narrative of Nisha Rawat, a young girl who lost her parents. She has skin cancer, Malignant Melanoma and her entire life revolves around the night. Nisha accepted her circumstances as they were. Her life, however, is turned upside down when she meets Suraj, a boy who works at a hospital. Dawn to Dusk becomes Nisha and Suraj's narrative.

programme.title: Faatima
programme.desc: Faatima is a story of two unknown individuals who meet each other for the first time at a cafe and share with each other some very interesting facts only to make us realize that good souls do exist.

programme.title: Double Blind
programme.desc: A Rendezvous of childhood friends takes place in a dark alley of Mumbai, among the chaos and hustle of the city that never sleeps.

programme.title: Fear Of Wheels
programme.desc: This film beautifully captures the emotional interplay between the vibrant, ambitious youth and the helpless, world-weary elders, showcasing the poignant struggle between generations. As a person reaches a certain stage in life, they observe numerous things happening around them, yet feel incapable of taking action. Over time, they become reliant on others even for the most basic tasks. This narrative portrays those individuals who experience old age gradually tightening its grip around them.

programme.title: Exchange Offer
programme.desc: A complaint registered to the manufacturing company for a dead computer brings back nostalgia and surprises in the life of a retired school principle who is living a mundane life.

programme.title: Dhoop Haskar Boli
programme.desc: A determined daughter walks into a matrimonial office with her quiet, circumspect mother. What follows next is an awkward conversation with a charming executive and an inward journey for all three.

programme.title: Dry Dreams
programme.desc: We mostly don’t care about things, which we have around us and are easily available here’s one such thrilling short film about a guy who has two visitors asking for water, what happens next is an eye opener.

programme.title: Complaint
programme.desc: A journey of a 12-year-old girl who visits the police station to report the disappearance of her bicycle. At the station, a police officer undertakes a heartwarming action to restore the child's trust, earning the admiration and faith of all those present. This incident serves as a powerful testament to our inherent, albeit sometimes unquestioning, belief in the police force.

programme.title: Game Of Caste
programme.desc: Game of Caste centers on Rakesh, an ordinary man visiting his aunt in her native village. He's initially captivated by the village's beauty but soon confronts a harsh reality: the mistreatment of a lower-caste boy by the villagers. This revelation shocks him, leading to his determined fight for the boy's rights. The overarching question remains: can he succeed in this battle between humanity and caste discrimination?

programme.title: Doughnut
programme.desc: Sameer, on his afternoon break from work, walks into a restaurant hoping for some quiet time. However, a doughnut with supposedly magical properties has him in for a shock. Fearing the unreal powers he suddenly acquires, he hurries out. How does a young woman who walks in right then change Sameer's attitude towards the magical doughnut?

programme.title: Dubki
programme.desc: Dubki is a story based on a true incident of a female constable in male-dominated law enforcement. Despite being a tough and dominant constable at the Lalkurti police station, Ganga Yadav was troubled several times by SHO Durgesh Mishra. Ganga complained about it to the IPS officer and asked for a transfer; however, he refused to help her. The female constable was left with no other choice but to take justice into her own hands.

programme.title: Electric Piya
programme.desc: A high school girl brings a new bulb for her study lamp. The bulb is anthropomorphic and he is exultant and joyful for having the luck of lighting for her. As he lights, he falls in love with the young girl.

programme.title: Famous
programme.desc: Once a huge superstar now faded into oblivion, submerges himself into alcohol and drugs to escape reality. One day fate makes him meet his biggest fan in an unusual circumstance.

programme.title: Cheepatakadumpa
programme.desc: ‘CHEEPATAKADUMPA’ follows three women over less than a day as they awaken their naughty teenage alter egos when they meet again after years, unleashing mischief on each other, and in turn on the biased patriarchal belief systems of the world they were born into. In a masculine culture that is unduly serious about making the rules that women are expected to live by, Teja, Santo and Tamanna find true and happy rebellion in the gasping throes of this mischief.

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Even in this modern era, there are several religious conflicts around us. We start judging a stranger based on his/her religion or culture. This short film is a humble attempt trying to reduce the distance between religions and thereby portraying religious bondage.

programme.title: First Sin
programme.desc: What would you do if you unexpectedly obtain magical powers? Ashwath, a failed businessman is having a troubled relationship with his wife . One fine morning he gets a Sand-timer at his door steps. Life takes a turn when he discovers magical powers in it. Will the Sand-timer be a boon or curse ?

programme.title: Days Left Behind
programme.desc: A man struggles to survive in a post-apocalyptic India where the World has been devastated by a deadly virus that turns people into wild cannibalistic creatures, until one day he comes across an abandoned car.

programme.title: Dhongbaaz
programme.desc: Upon learning about his bride's unfaithfulness, an anguished groom delves into her past to uncover the truth, all while the wedding guests impatiently await his return.

programme.title: Faith
programme.desc: This Young Couple is Super Excited as they just got the permission to go on a night out together but things take an unexpected turn as they get abducted in the middle of the night. The Goons are Brutal on them and it seems that there is no way out until the protagonist thinks of a supernatural idea.

programme.title: Firki
programme.desc: It's the way many father's typically behave when their children start driving. The idea of using the navigation tool to highlight the generation gap is also based on my own life experience. The title is Firki because the family is spinning around like a Firki without having reached their destination in the film. It's also depicts how they've been taken for a ride by the navigation app, or as we say in Hindi....Firki le li

programme.title: Didi!
programme.desc: Imagine waking up to an annoying alarm sound. Familiar? Now imagine waking up to someone else's alarm! Why isn't anyone shutting it? Find out what happens when an annoyed brother wakes up to his sister's loud alarm and storms to her room only to find it empty.

programme.title: Foul
programme.desc: Against the setting of a journey to Thailand, Ayush, a lustful businessman, possesses both the capability and cleverness to be unfaithful to his wife and shatter her aspirations of moving to Canada. Yet, the question remains: Can he thwart her pursuit of realizing her dreams?

programme.title: Gunjaaish
programme.desc: A heartfelt journey of a couple raising a child with autism, discovering the power of love, resilience, and community. Featuring autistic actors, this ground breaking film celebrates acceptance and the beauty of being different.

programme.title: Dum Dum Deega Deega
programme.desc: The solution to your problem is often hidden in the problem itself; all you need is a different outlook. The story of a beggar child, Ajju, who lives on the streets of Mumbai, but dreams big. He challenges his unfortunate fate, with nothing but a 'different outlook' towards the situation he faces.

programme.title: Cycle Of Sorrows
programme.desc: Set in a rural village, this heart-wrenching story follows a poor father with a beloved daughter, who still yearns for a son as his pregnant wife prepares to give birth. Driven by financial hardship, he makes a tragic decision that not only shatters his family but leaves his relationship with his daughter and wife forever scarred. Watch this emotional tale of a father’s regret and the lasting impact on his family. Can he undo the damage he’s caused?

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: A meticulously planned date night goes terribly wrong when the husband reveals that he will not be able to make it.

programme.title: Desh Ki Pardesh ?
programme.desc: The film follows the Parikh's on their visit to their children settled in the US. However, to only realize that there's a lot more than just a generation gap between them. Mainly, dawning upon Hasmuk Parikh's that it's great to dream big for your children, but one must be mentally prepared that those dreams may or not have them in it.

programme.title: Expectations
programme.desc: The story is about a boy grappling with overwhelming feelings and contemplating drastic measures. This growing issue among the younger generation stems from unfulfilled expectations placed by society. 'Expectations' is a short film exploring the theme of emotional struggles and their severe consequences.

programme.title: Perks Of Being An Actor
programme.desc: A relentless pursuit of an aging actor to become a HERO and how these struggles land him in awkward situations.

programme.title: Faboo
programme.desc: Are we using social media to expand our horizon or are we overusing it and unknowingly desensitizing ourselves. Faboo explores this aspect of social media and nudges us to think about it through this story of a mother and son.

programme.title: Dwand
programme.desc: Ruby, a lower-middle-class girl was made to believe that she is beautiful, intelligent, and different and that she deserves a worthy husband. She completed her studies and wanted to be a career girl. However, the marriage happened contrary to her expectations with a traditional man Vivek of the similar lower middle-class strata. After giving birth to a girl child she revolted and joined an advertising company to shape up her career. Here begins the nightmare.

programme.title: Goals
programme.desc: As Meera, our pretty in pink protagonist comes back to Bombay after spending several months apart from her beau Ranbir, the circumstances force them to evaluate the basis of their relationship. This film is a deep dive into a young adult's core problems of emotional dishonesty and preference of style over substance.

programme.title: Epicfail
programme.desc: It is difficult to understand the truth about Ramayana in today’s time as it gets lost in translation. This is a film about a young and passionate journalist discovering the truth about Sita.

programme.title: Duty
programme.desc: Different classes in society are intertwined, with each person's actions impacting others. When individuals from various classes fulfil their responsibilities, stability is achieved. This story explores fairness and the expression of duty among people from different social strata.

programme.title: Firefly
programme.desc: A chance encounter with a piece from his past, leads Ved, a young man to reminisce a fateful night with his girlfriend, Daaria.

programme.title: Destiny's Two
programme.desc: Mohan and his dwarf wife have come to Mumbai from Gujarat for his work. They are a newly wed couple. Their marriage is a compromise, as they do not see the spouse of their imagination in each other. Mohan who gets fascinated seeing taller women realizes the same about his wife. He decides to go to a red light area to fulfill his desire. But does he do it?

programme.title: Faatima
programme.desc: Faatima is a story of two unknown individuals who meet each other for the first time at a cafe and share with each other some very interesting facts only to make us realize that good souls do exist.

programme.title: Fear Of Wheels
programme.desc: This film beautifully captures the emotional interplay between the vibrant, ambitious youth and the helpless, world-weary elders, showcasing the poignant struggle between generations. As a person reaches a certain stage in life, they observe numerous things happening around them, yet feel incapable of taking action. Over time, they become reliant on others even for the most basic tasks. This narrative portrays those individuals who experience old age gradually tightening its grip around them.

programme.title: Dhoop Haskar Boli
programme.desc: A determined daughter walks into a matrimonial office with her quiet, circumspect mother. What follows next is an awkward conversation with a charming executive and an inward journey for all three.

programme.title: Complaint
programme.desc: A journey of a 12-year-old girl who visits the police station to report the disappearance of her bicycle. At the station, a police officer undertakes a heartwarming action to restore the child's trust, earning the admiration and faith of all those present. This incident serves as a powerful testament to our inherent, albeit sometimes unquestioning, belief in the police force.

programme.title: Doughnut
programme.desc: Sameer, on his afternoon break from work, walks into a restaurant hoping for some quiet time. However, a doughnut with supposedly magical properties has him in for a shock. Fearing the unreal powers he suddenly acquires, he hurries out. How does a young woman who walks in right then change Sameer's attitude towards the magical doughnut?

programme.title: Electric Piya
programme.desc: A high school girl brings a new bulb for her study lamp. The bulb is anthropomorphic and he is exultant and joyful for having the luck of lighting for her. As he lights, he falls in love with the young girl.

programme.title: Cheepatakadumpa
programme.desc: ‘CHEEPATAKADUMPA’ follows three women over less than a day as they awaken their naughty teenage alter egos when they meet again after years, unleashing mischief on each other, and in turn on the biased patriarchal belief systems of the world they were born into. In a masculine culture that is unduly serious about making the rules that women are expected to live by, Teja, Santo and Tamanna find true and happy rebellion in the gasping throes of this mischief.

programme.title: First Sin
programme.desc: What would you do if you unexpectedly obtain magical powers? Ashwath, a failed businessman is having a troubled relationship with his wife . One fine morning he gets a Sand-timer at his door steps. Life takes a turn when he discovers magical powers in it. Will the Sand-timer be a boon or curse ?

programme.title: Dhongbaaz
programme.desc: Upon learning about his bride's unfaithfulness, an anguished groom delves into her past to uncover the truth, all while the wedding guests impatiently await his return.

programme.title: Firki
programme.desc: It's the way many father's typically behave when their children start driving. The idea of using the navigation tool to highlight the generation gap is also based on my own life experience. The title is Firki because the family is spinning around like a Firki without having reached their destination in the film. It's also depicts how they've been taken for a ride by the navigation app, or as we say in Hindi....Firki le li

programme.title: Foul
programme.desc: Against the setting of a journey to Thailand, Ayush, a lustful businessman, possesses both the capability and cleverness to be unfaithful to his wife and shatter her aspirations of moving to Canada. Yet, the question remains: Can he thwart her pursuit of realizing her dreams?

programme.title: Dum Dum Deega Deega

The story of a beggar child, Ajju, who lives on the streets of Mumbai, but dreams big. He challenges his unfortunate fate, with nothing but a 'different outlook' towards the situation he faces.

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: A meticulously planned date night goes terribly wrong when the husband reveals that he will not be able to make it.

programme.title: Expectations

This growing issue among the younger generation stems from unfulfilled expectations placed by society. 'Expectations' is a short film exploring the theme of emotional struggles and their severe consequences.

programme.title: Faboo
programme.desc: Are we using social media to expand our horizon or are we overusing it and unknowingly desensitizing ourselves. Faboo explores this aspect of social media and nudges us to think about it through this story of a mother and son.

programme.title: Dadi Ka Murabba
programme.desc: Ramesh dreams of a good job but his lack of fluent English hinders him. His Dadi advises him to be self-reliant, prompting him to sell murabba with her help. His business grows, and he asked to raise the flag at his old school on Independence Day. The sarpanch tells him that as a self-reliant young individual, Ramesh can add to the nation's growth. The film shows that it takes both an individual's grit and determination and the support of loved ones to achieve the impossible.

programme.title: Firni
programme.desc: The next-door neighbors are having a fight and they send their rude 14-year-old daughter Firni to keep her busy.

programme.title: Chup Chap
programme.desc: Following a newlywed couple enjoying a robust and empathetic bond, their world takes a turn during a party with friends, sparking a profound shift in their perspectives. Despite their differing opinions, both stand firm in their convictions. When an issue deeply troubles the wife, she bravely advocates for justice. After a prolonged battle, legal verdict is achieved. Yet, uncertainties linger about the truth behind this justice, leaving the tale shrouded in ambiguity.

programme.title: Damdi
programme.desc: Damdi, is a story of a young boy. Whose parents left him in childhood, was pampered by her grandmother by working as a babysitter. Damdi has grown up and works in a garage, also studying together. A dear friend Paltan keeps warning him against good and evil. A garage owner Lallan bhaiya acts as a guide. Damdi is in love with a girl Gunja. He has an addiction and attraction towards intoxication, becoming the heart's weakness. Heartbreaks and despairs but returns to a new direction in life again.

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk
programme.desc: Dawn to Dusk tells the narrative of Nisha Rawat, a young girl who lost her parents. She has skin cancer, Malignant Melanoma and her entire life revolves around the night. Nisha accepted her circumstances as they were. Her life, however, is turned upside down when she meets Suraj, a boy who works at a hospital. Dawn to Dusk becomes Nisha and Suraj's narrative.

programme.title: Double Blind
programme.desc: A Rendezvous of childhood friends takes place in a dark alley of Mumbai, among the chaos and hustle of the city that never sleeps.

programme.title: Exchange Offer
programme.desc: A complaint registered to the manufacturing company for a dead computer brings back nostalgia and surprises in the life of a retired school principle who is living a mundane life.

programme.title: Out Of Death
programme.desc: From the producers of The Irishman & Lone Survivor comes this thrilling story of Jack Harris (Bruce Willis) who must tap into his killer instincts to survive the wilderness and the human predators as he tries to help a woman who witnesses a crime and finds herself running from a rural mountain town's corrupt police department after she took a video of police killing a drug dealer.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: Regeneration
programme.desc: Terrorists kidnap the Russian Prime Minister's two kids, take Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant and threaten to blow up a reactor. Four Universal Soldiers go in but are no match to a Next Generation UniSol. The world's only hope is to reactivate decommissioned Universal Soldier Luc Deveraux.

programme.title: Tekken: Kazuya's Revenge
programme.desc: Suffering from amnesia, a young man trying to discover his true identity is kidnapped by an underground crime organization and turned into a ruthless assassin

programme.title: Poseidon Rex
programme.desc: While searching for lost treasure, deep sea divers unleash a monster that causes havoc and destruction not only in sea but also on land.

programme.title: The Catcher Was A Spy
programme.desc: With an ensemble cast, this gripping, espionage thriller brings to life the true story of Moe Berg a World War II spy. His mission: go behind enemy lines in Europe to assassinate the Nazi's chief nuclear scientist before the Germans develop an atomic bomb. Berg must rely on his steel-trap intellect in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse - with the fate of the world hanging in the balance.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: We control the fear, you understand? Without the fear, we are all good as dead.’ The notorious gangster Al Capone observed that “Prohibition has made nothing but trouble,” and “I am like any other man. All I do is supply a demand.” Acclaimed director delivers a thrillingly vivid slice of American outlaw history in his epic gangster tale, LAWLESS. LAWLESS is the true story of the infamous Bondurant Brothers: three bootlegging siblings who made a run for the American Dream in Prohibition-era Virginia. The film gathers an ensemble of gifted, dynamic new-generation stars – Tom Hardy, Shia LaBeouf, Jessica Chastain, Jason Clarke, Mia Wasikowska, Dane DeHaan – alongside two of the finest actors of their generations, Guy Pearce and Gary Oldman. A riveting, intense story of Crime and Corruption, Loyalty and Love, Brutality and Tenderness, LAWLESS is a rich addition to the American Gangster Canon.

programme.title: Wrecker
programme.desc: Two beautiful young women taking a trip through the countryside, are terrorized by an unknown driver trying to run them down in a heavy duty tow truck.

programme.title: Redline
programme.desc: Redline is an auto/action thriller that features an extensive exotic car collection Phantom Rolls Royce, Lamborghini Murcielago, Enzo Ferrari, Ferrari F430, Ferrari Scaglietti and two Mercedes SLR McLaren AMGs. The film follows a gorgeous young automobile fanaticize driver who becomes part of illegal drag racing competitions organized by exotic car fanatics.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: Regeneration
programme.desc: Terrorists kidnap the Russian Prime Minister's two kids, take Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant and threaten to blow up a reactor. Four Universal Soldiers go in but are no match to a Next Generation UniSol. The world's only hope is to reactivate decommissioned Universal Soldier Luc Deveraux.

programme.title: Haywire
programme.desc: From Academy Award-winning director Steven Soderbergh of Ocean’s 11, 12 & 13 comes HAYWIRE. A Female Assassin covert operative is hired to various global missions to perform jobs which governments can't authorize. When the operation goes awry, she needs to use all of her skills & tricks to escape an international manhunt and eliminate the last remaining link of the conspiracy against her.

programme.title: Poseidon Rex
programme.desc: While searching for lost treasure, deep sea divers unleash a monster that causes havoc and destruction not only in sea but also on land.

programme.title: Spytime
programme.desc: Anacleto, a former secret agent, is forced to come out of retirement and protect his son, Adolfo, when his arch-enemy, Vazquez, breaks out of prison and targets him

programme.title: Universal Soldier: Day Of Reckoning
programme.desc: John awakens from a coma to discover his wife and daughter were murdered in a brutal home invasion. Haunted by images of the attack, he vows to kill the man responsible: The fight pits John against Andrew Scott and an army of genetically enhanced warriors; meanwhile, he must contend with a Uni Sol in relentless pursuit.

programme.title: The Catcher Was A Spy

Berg must rely on his steel-trap intellect in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse - with the fate of the world hanging in the balance.

programme.title: Bad Samaritan
programme.desc: Bad Samaritan is a terrifying thriller of two young car valets who use their business as a front to burglarize houses of customers while they eat. Their lives are turned upside down when they rob the home of a demented serial killer after making a shocking discovery of a woman being held captive. They must choose to run and hide, or face the killer whose dark secrets they have just exposed.

programme.desc: Deep in the ice of the antarctic, a team of geologists uncover an old Nazi warship still intact where dark experiments had occurred. programme.title: Redline
programme.desc: Redline is an auto/action thriller that features an extensive exotic car collection Phantom Rolls Royce, Lamborghini Murcielago, Enzo Ferrari, Ferrari F430, Ferrari Scaglietti and two Mercedes SLR McLaren AMGs. The film follows a gorgeous young automobile fanaticize driver who becomes part of illegal drag racing competitions organized by exotic car fanatics.

programme.title: Rememory
programme.desc: You can’t escape them. They’re everywhere. They bring tears to our eyes. They make us laugh. They bring us pain. Gordon a visionary inventor of the Rememory machine that allows him to see memories. He dies in his office. Is it murder? Sam investigates by using the machine "borrowed" from Gordon's wife. He looks at memories of others involved. REMEMORY is a noir mystery Thriller.

programme.title: Aileen Wuornos: American Boogeywoman
programme.desc: True Story that follows America’s most notorious Female Serial killer. Based on Aileen Wuorno’s early life. Back in 1976 a young Aileen arrives in Florida searching for a new life, marries a wealthy yacht club president to start as part of Florida’s high society. Tormented by her inner demons she surrenders to her murderous impulses havoc in the peaceful community.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 2
programme.desc: Every 23rd spring for 23days, it gets to eat…Stranded on a lonely road, a school bus full of high school players must defend themselves from the Creeper, the winged, flesh-eating terror - ancient beast that resurfaces on the earth every 23 years to feed.

programme.title: King Lear
programme.desc: King Lear poses the question: What does it mean to be human? Its subtitle could be Being Human. Cruelty, barbarity, savagery, kindness, tenderness, love, in a world that gives not very much back. Set in the fictional present, an aging King invites disaster when he abdicates to his corrupt, toadying daughters, and rejects his loving and honest one.

programme.title: Jurassic Attack
programme.desc: A group of soldiers attempting to rescue a hostage from a terrorist crash land into unfamiliar jungles which are inhabited by a group of long hidden dinosaurs. Now they must find a way out of this isolated valley before becoming prey for prehistoric predators.

programme.title: Beauty And The Beast
programme.desc: This timeless tale was originally written in 1757. Could Beauty ever love the ghastly lord, the Beast? The year is 1810. After losing his fortune at sea, a bankrupt merchant poor father-of-six, after plucking a scented rose from the repulsive master's garden must do the impossible, permit his daughter Beauty, to take his place and pay for the parent’s sins. Only true love can break the spell.

programme.title: Riders Of Justice
programme.desc: Markus goes home to his teenage daughter, Mathilde, when his wife dies in a train crash. All appears to be a tragic accident until a mathematics geek, who was also a fellow passenger on the train, and his two colleagues show up.
